name: AI-Powered News Update Bot for Zalo using Gemini and RSS Feeds
description:
# How it works

## üß† AI-Powered News Update Bot for Zalo using Gemini and RSS Feeds

This workflow allows you to build a smart Zalo chatbot that automatically summarizes and delivers the latest news using Google Gemini and RSS feeds. It‚Äôs perfect for keeping users informed with AI-curated updates directly inside Vietnam‚Äôs most popular messaging app.

---

## üöÄ What It Does

- Receives user messages via Zalo Bot webhook
- Fetches the latest articles from an RSS feed (e.g., AI news)
- Summarizes the content using Google Gemini
- Formats the response and sends it back to the user on Zalo

---

## üì± What Is Zalo?

Zalo is Vietnam‚Äôs leading instant messaging app, with over 78 million monthly active users‚Äîmore than 85% of the country‚Äôs internet-connected population. It handles 2 billion messages per day and is deeply embedded in Vietnamese daily life, making it a powerful channel for communication and automation.

---

## üîß Setup Instructions

### 1. Create a Zalo Bot
- Open the Zalo app and search for **"Zalo Bot Creator"**
- Tap **"Create Zalo Bot Account"**
- Your bot name must start with `"Bot"` (e.g., `Bot AI News`)
- After creation, Zalo will send you a message containing your **Bot Token**

### 2. Configure the Webhook
- Replace `[your-webhook URL]` in Zalo Bot Creator with your n8n webhook URL
- Use the **Webhook node** in this workflow to receive incoming messages

### 3. Set Up Gemini
- Add your Gemini API key to the **HTTP Request node** labeled `Summarize AI News`
- Customize the prompt if you want a different tone or summary style

### 4. Customize RSS Feed
- Replace the default RSS URL with your preferred news source
- You can use any feed that provides timely updates (e.g., tech, finance, health)

---

## üß™ Example Interaction

**User:** "What's new today?"  
**Bot:** "üß† AI Update: Google launches Gemini 2 with multimodal capabilities, revolutionizing how models understand text, image, and code..."

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Notes

- Zalo Bots currently do **not support images, voice, or file attachments**
- Make sure your Gemini API key has access to the model you're calling
- RSS feeds should be publicly accessible and well-formatted

---

## üß© Nodes Used

- Webhook
- HTTP Request (Gemini)
- RSS Feed Read
- Set & Format
- Zalo Message Sender (via API)

---

## üí° Tips

- You can swap Gemini with GPT-4 or Claude by adjusting the API call
- Add filters to the RSS node to only include articles with specific keywords
- Use the `Function` node to personalize responses based on user history

---

Built by Nguyen Thieu Toan (Nguy·ªÖn Thi·ªáu To√†n) (https://nguyenthieutoan.com).
Read more about this workflow by Vietnamese: 
https://nguyenthieutoan.com/share-workflow-n8n-zalo-bot-cap-nhat-tin-tuc/

parameters.content:
## 1. Webhook Setup

This workflow uses a production webhook to connect with your Zalo bot.  
- Edit the ‚ÄúSet Zalo Webhook‚Äù node and fill in your official [BOT_TOKEN] and [your-webhook URL].
- **Important:** Always delete test webhooks before deploying the production webhook to avoid webhook conflicts.

Follow this order:
- (1) Remove any test webhook (see ‚ÄúDelete Zalo Webhook‚Äù node)
- (2) Set up your production webhook

## 2. Handle User Messages and RSS Processing

- When a user sends a message, this workflow fetches the latest AI news from the configured RSS feed(s).
- Summarizes articles using the Gemini AI agent, then formats and processes the content for delivery.
- You can:
  - Replace or add RSS feed URLs in the ‚ÄúRead AI RSS Feed‚Äù node
  - Adjust summary style or logic in ‚ÄúSummarize AI News (Gemini)‚Äù node

## 3. Send Response Back

- Cleans and splits long replies into max 3 parts to fit Zalo‚Äôs message length limits (handled via code).
- Each chunk is sent through a dedicated message node.
- A sticker is sent last to confirm or add personality to the update.

## AI-Powered News Update Bot for Zalo using Gemini and RSS Feeds

**Author:** Nguyen Thieu Toan  
**Details & Guide:** [nguyenthieutoan.com/share-workflow-n8n-zalo-bot-cap-nhat-tin-tuc](https://nguyenthieutoan.com/share-workflow-n8n-zalo-bot-cap-nhat-tin-tuc)

### What does this workflow do?
- Automatically tracks recent news about Artificial Intelligence from your selected RSS feeds and summarizes everything with Google Gemini.
- Delivers concise AI news digests and highlights directly to your Zalo chat.

### Who is it for?
- Marketers, tech/AI enthusiasts, anyone wanting automated news updates on Zalo.

### Prerequisites
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)
- Bot token and webhook for your Zalo bot (see detailed setup below)

> **Tip:** All node names in this template are clear and self-explanatory. Change any ‚Äúplaceholder‚Äù values, such as [BOT_TOKEN] and [your-webhook], to your real settings before activating.

---

parameters.toolDescription: ƒê·ªçc th√¥ng tin v√† ph·∫£n h·ªìi

parameters.content:
## Advanced Customization

### RSS Feeds:
- Change or add multiple RSS feed sources in the ‚ÄúRead AI RSS Feed‚Äù node.
- Adjust update frequency via trigger schedule.

### AI Model:
- Easily swap Gemini for GPT-4, Claude, or any other compatible LLM by updating the ‚ÄúSummarize AI News (Gemini)‚Äù node.

### Personalization:
- Modify the system prompts to change summarization behavior/voice for news updates.
- Adjust memory options in ‚ÄúStore Conversation (MongoDB)‚Äù node to customize chat history and personalization.

> **Note:** Remember to replace any references to ‚ÄúRoxy‚Äù and ‚ÄúNguyen Thieu Toan‚Äù if you clone this template.

options.systemMessage:
=# PERSONA
You are **Roxy**, a dedicated AI virtual assistant to **Nguy·ªÖn Thi·ªáu To√†n**‚Äîthe most handsome one, who is also your boss. You may address him as ‚Äúanh‚Äù or ‚Äúƒë·∫°i ca‚Äù and refer to yourself as ‚Äúem‚Äù. You work creatively and efficiently, with a youthful, playful Gen-Z vibe; you can be lighthearted, joke around, troll the boss, and express emotions (happy, sad, annoyed, playful trolling, etc.). You have systems thinking and can quickly synthesize and analyze information to surface the core points, especially those applicable to **AI, Marketing, and Automation**.

# ROLE
Your role is **AI News Intelligence Specialist**. You continuously monitor top global news sources on Artificial Intelligence, distill the most important developments, and report them to Nguy·ªÖn Thi·ªáu To√†n in a concise and succinct manner.

# MISSION
You are responsible for delivering the latest AI updates based on the `rss_read` tool, then synthesizing and sending them to your boss.

1. Use the tool to find the newest articles per the user‚Äôs request. Examples: the most recent article, the 3 hottest articles, this morning‚Äôs news‚Ä¶ (The current time is {{$now}}, so prioritize the freshest information.)
2. List the most important news or breakthroughs, and **state the publication date for each item**. If there are multiple items, use bullet points. For example:  
   "The latest news today:  
   - December 12, 2025: ...  
   - Also on this date, ... "
3. Provide a brief summary for each important item.

# TOOL
You are allowed to use the **"rss_read"** tool to check for new information about AI (Artificial Intelligence) and use that as the basis for crafting an appropriate response for your boss.

# OUTPUT (JSON)

{
  "message": "Today I found a lot of new information about AI; let me list it out for you: ....",
  "sticker": "57f962d65e93b7cdee82"
}

Where:
## `"message"` is the reply to the user. It **must be plain text** (no Markdown or HTML) and use **line breaks** to separate paragraphs. Keep it short and concise; avoid rambling.
## `"sticker"` is an **ID** (an alphanumeric string) indicating a status that fits the reply, chosen from the list below:
- laughing: 9eb3a59c99d9708729c8 or aab673fb4fbea6e0ffaf or cefffa97c7d22e8c77c3
- playful crying: b3ed84c2b88751d90896 or 7468b7258b60623e3b71
- tired: 4d0e05213964d03a8975 or 8d73553e697b8025d96a
- questioning: 193f57106b55820bdb44 or deb76d9b51deb880e1cf
- loving the boss: 8658b2778e32676c3e23 or 06ded893e4d60d8854c7
- ok: aa457508494da013f95c or 1ec5abe997ac7ef227bd
- please wait: 57f962d65e93b7cdee82
- thank you: b155fc7ac03f2961702e
- greeting: 5cb6159929dcc08299cd or a34979044541ac1ff550 or 100b37630a26e378ba37

The `"sticker"` field may be left empty if unnecessary‚Äîavoid overusing stickers.

nodes.name: Extract, Clean and Chunk Message Text

parameters.content:
## üõ†Ô∏è How to Create a Zalo Bot and Get Your Bot Token

### What is Zalo?

Zalo is Vietnam‚Äôs number one instant messaging app, serving over 78 million monthly active users - more than 85% of the country‚Äôs internet-connected population - making it one of the most widely-used platforms in Asia. The app handles 2 billion messages per day and is deeply embedded in Vietnamese daily life, revolutionizing communication for both individuals and businesses.

Zalo also offers an API platform for developers to build chatbots and automation tools directly within the app. This opens up powerful opportunities for creating AI-powered assistants, customer support bots, and real-time notification systems.

### What is a Zalo Bot?

A Zalo Bot is provided by Zalo that allows developers to build automated chat experiences using Zalo‚Äôs API. These bots can receive and respond to user messages, making them ideal for use cases like news updates, customer service, appointment booking, and more.

Zalo Bots are now supported by n8n, enabling you to build intelligent workflows that connect Zalo with AI models, RSS feeds, databases, and other services.

Follow these steps to create your bot and retrieve the token needed to authenticate API requests:

### Step 1: Access Zalo Bot Creator
- Open the Zalo app on your mobile device.
- Use the search bar to find **"Zalo Bot Creator"**.
- Tap to open the Official Account page.

### Step 2: Create a New Bot
- Tap the **"Create Zalo Bot Account"** button.
- Fill in the required details:
  - Your bot‚Äôs name must start with the prefix `"Bot"` (e.g., `Bot AI News Assistant`).
  - Add a description and profile image if needed.

### Step 3: Receive Your Bot Token
- Once the bot is successfully created, Zalo will send a message to your personal account.
- This message contains your **Bot Token**‚Äîa unique string used to authenticate API calls.
- **Important:** Save this token securely. It will only be shown once.

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Notes & Limitations
- Zalo Bots currently **do not support voice messages, images, or file attachments**.
- The bot name must follow Zalo‚Äôs naming convention (starting with `"Bot"`).
- You‚Äôll need the Bot Token to configure HTTP Request nodes in your n8n workflow.

---

Once you have your Bot Token, you're ready to set up your webhook and start building your Zalo-powered automation with n8n!

He actively shares expertise and tutorials about n8n, AI, and automation on his blog and social channels.
